message.entry: Inserts a table entry
Table Entry
Inherit ({0})
Horizontal alignment
Position of this entry relative to the left and right sides of the column in which it resides
Vertical alignment
Position of this entry relative to the top and bottom of the row in which it resides
Entry Alignment Options
Options for aligning entry vertically and horizontally relative to the entry boundaries
Column separator
Creates a line between this entry and the next in the row
Row separator
Creates a line between this entry and the entry in the next row
Entry Separator Options
Options for drawing lines to separate this entry from its neighbors
Span start column name
Name of the first column that this entry spans (accepts %<expr>), not supported for RTF/Word formats
Span end column name
Name of the last column spanned by this entry (accepts %<expr>), not supported for RTF/Word formats
Rows spanned
Number of rows spanned by this entry (accepts %<expr>), not supported for RTF/Word formats
Row and Column Spanning Options
Options for causing this entry to span multiple columns and/or rows
Word/RTF does not support nested tables
Background Color
Background color of this entry. Select color from list or enter MATLAB expression as %<expr> or RGB color value as #RRGGBB
Orientation of the text in this entry relative to the page text flow (PDF only)
Width of text in this entry if the text is rotated relative to the page text flow
Options for rotating the text in this entry, e.g., a column header rotated 90 degrees to save space (applies only to PDF output)
